sentences.sCn: 他的态度带有几分傲慢。

sentences.sContent: I'll make you suffer for this insolence.
sentences.sContent_eng: I'll make you suffer for this insolence.
sentences.sCn: 我会使你为这种傲慢态度而吃苦头。

sentences.sContent: I could not endure the insolence of his behaviour.
sentences.sContent_eng: I could not endure the insolence of his behaviour.
sentences.sCn: 我不能再忍受他那傲慢无礼的行为了。

remMethod.val: in(不) + sol(习惯了的) + ence → 不寻常 → 傲慢， 无礼

words.tran: 无礼的；傲慢的；粗野的；无耻的
